code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Logo from'../img/Logo.png';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NavBar=_ref=>{let{showSignUp,showSignIn,showSignOut,isLoggedIn}=_ref;const[allCategories,setAllCategories]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch("/categories").then(resp=>resp.json()).then(data=>setAllCategories(data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Logo,alt:"logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu_container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"home",to:"/",children:"Home"}),allCategories&&allCategories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"menu",to:"/categories/".concat(category.name),children:category.name},category.id))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"links",children:isLoggedIn?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"small ui button",onClick:showSignOut,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Sign Out"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"small ui teal button",to:"/profile_page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{style:{color:'white'},children:"Profile"})})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"mini ui teal button",onClick:showSignIn,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Sign In"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"mini ui teal button",onClick:showSignUp,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"Sign Up"})})]})})]})});};export default NavBar;
